attributes.additional_details: We propose that the government makes a U-turn on their decision to allow universities to raise tuition fees to a maximum of £9000 a year. Currently as of 2012 64 universities charge £9000 and the remaining 59 charge £6000; whereas in 2003 they were only allowed to charge up to £3000 a year. Sign this petition to get your voice heard and a possibility of a reduction in Tuition fees.
